text: Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines is a French public university. It was created in 1991 in the department of Yvelines. Since 2002, it has been in Hauts-de-Seine. It is mainly in the cities of Versailles, Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines, Mantes-en-Yvelines and Vélizy-Villacoublay and Rambouillet. It has eight campuses. The school has 19,000 students, 752 staff people and 1389 teachers and researchers. 285 teachers outside of the university come each year to give courses. The subjects taught are the sciences, the social sciences, the political sciences, engineering, technology and medicine. It also has courses about the relationship between economy, ethics, natural environment and sustainable development. The university has a logo showing a white sunrise on a green earth referring to the sustainable development, major theme of the university. == Administration == Like all the other French universities, UVSQ is managed by a President elected by the Board of directors. He is member of the three councils of the university. * The board of directors, which decides the strategy of the institution.Les 3 conseils de l'université * The academic and university life council, which is responsible for training. * The scientific council, which is responsible for research activities. === Presidents === List of presidents Name Years Michel Garnier 1991 to 1997 Dominique Gentile 1998 to 2002 Sylvie Faucheux 2002 to 2012 Jean-Luc Vayssière 2012 to 2016 Didier Guillemot 2016 to 2017 Alain Bui Since 2017 === Faculties === UVSQ has seven faculties: science,UFR des sciences social science,UFR des sciences sociales law and political science,Faculté de droit et de science politique (DSP) Île-de-France West medical training and research faculty,UFR des sciences de la santé institute of languages and international studies,Institut des langues et des études internationales (ILEI) institute of cultural studies,Institut d'études culturelles (IEC) and the higher institute of management.Institut supérieur de management (ISM) === Graduate schools and institutes === UVSQ as a postgraduate school in engineering, called ISTY, and two University Institutes of Technology.Versailles - IUT Vélizy-Villacoublay There is also a training center for apprentices (called CFA d'Alembert).Guyancourt : le CFA D’Alembert sur les bancs de la fac The university also has PhD graduate schools. === Library and electronic documentation network === Its main library, opened in June 2002. Its area is and it has 100,000 books. In total, the university has six academic libraries with about 200,000 books, 5,000 digital books and 26,000 magazines and newspapers.Un nouveau site pour les bibliothèques universitaires == Student life == In September 2011, 31 associations are approved by UVSQ.Page le portail des étudiants - Panorama des associations They are in science, social sciences and humanities, law, medicine, humanitarian-social-environment, communication, entertainment, thought and politics. 14,226 students were at the university in 2004. === Demographic changes === 1993 1995 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010 -
